snippet: A surprise decision by the Supreme Court on Monday cleared the way for same-sex marriages to take place in five states; Virginia moved quickly to start performing weddings.
lead_paragraph: A surprise decision by the Supreme Court on Monday cleared the way for same-sex marriages to take place in five states; Virginia moved quickly to start performing weddings.

headline.main: Gay Couples Wed After Same-Sex Marriage Decision

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
